title: Bacon 'n' Egg Cups
directions: Cut pie crust into 4 equal pieces. Fit pieces over back of a cupcake tin, molding each to fit around a cup. Place on a baking sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes, or until light brown. Cool 5 minutes, then remove from muffin cups and invert onto baking sheet.

Reduce oven to 375 degrees F. In a medium bowl, combine eggs, milk, bacon bits, scallion, 1/2 cup cheese, the salt, and pepper; mix well.Â Spoon mixture equally into individual cups, and sprinkle each with remaining cheese.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes, or until eggs are set.
